actions.text: Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing amounts from the contingent fund of the House for continuance of necessary investigations and studies by standing and select committees of the House through March 31, 1983.

summary.text: Provides amounts from the contingent fund of the House for continuance of necessary investigations and studies by standing and select committees through March 31, 1983. Authorizes expenditures by the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct for the procurement of consultant services for a specified investigation.

titles.title: A resolution providing amounts from the contingent fund of the House for continuance of necessary investigations and studies by standing and select committees of the House through March 31, 1983.
